attributes.action: Cut off all foreign currency transactions to ZImbabwe immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The election in Zimbabwe happens in 2 weeks. We urge the PM to cut off all foreign currency to Zimbabwe through the Exchange Control Act 1947. This might cause more suffering to the Zimbabwean people, but will ensure that Mugabe and his government have no access to money to use in the torture and killing of innocents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
